mapper.update:
update om_order_details
order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
details_order_id = #{detailsOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
buy_num = #{buyNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
project_type = #{projectType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_project_id = #{orderProjectId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subtitle = #{subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
main_image = #{mainImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
insure_num = #{insureNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
policy_url = #{policyUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
channel_id = #{channelId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=BIGINT},
combo_project_id = #{comboProjectId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sku_id = #{skuId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
spec_model = #{specModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
retail_price = #{retailPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
stock_price = #{stockPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
brand = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supplier = #{supplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
express_company = #{expressCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
express_no = #{expressNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
take_goods_name = #{takeGoodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
take_goods_phoneno = #{takeGoodsPhoneno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
take_goods_address = #{takeGoodsAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update om_order_details set order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, details_order_id = #{detailsOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, buy_num = #{buyNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, project_type = #{projectType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_project_id = #{orderProjectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subtitle = #{subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, main_image = #{mainImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, insure_num = #{insureNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, policy_url = #{policyUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channel_id = #{channelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, combo_project_id = #{comboProjectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sku_id = #{skuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, spec_model = #{specModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, retail_price = #{retailPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, stock_price = #{stockPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, brand = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplier = #{supplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, express_company = #{expressCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, express_no = #{expressNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, take_goods_name = #{takeGoodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, take_goods_phoneno = #{takeGoodsPhoneno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, take_goods_address = #{takeGoodsAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT d.id, d.order_id, d.details_order_id, d.buy_num, d.price, d.project_type, d.order_project_id, d.product_name, d.subtitle, d.main_image, d.insure_num, d.policy_url, d.channel_id, d.remark, d.operator, d.combo_project_id, d.sku_id, d.spec_model, d.retail_price, d.stock_price, d.brand, d.supplier, d.express_company, d.express_no, d.take_goods_name, d.take_goods_phoneno, d.take_goods_address, d.create_time, d.modify_time, d.deleted FROM om_order_details d LEFT JOIN om_order o ON o.id =d.order_id WHERE o.order_number=#{orderNumber}
